remarks: The quotient of two infinite products.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 15-Jan-2018.)
statement:
prodfdiv.1 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) $.
prodfdiv.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( F ` k ) e. CC ) $.
prodfdiv.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( G ` k ) e. CC ) $.
prodfdiv.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( G ` k ) =/= 0 ) $.
prodfdiv.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> ( H ` k ) = ( ( F ` k ) / ( G ` k ) ) ) $.
prodfdiv $p |- ( ph -> ( seq M ( x. , H ) ` N ) = ( ( seq M ( x. , F ) ` N ) / ( seq M ( x. , G ) ` N ) ) ) $.
$d F k $.
$d G k $.
$d H k $.
$d M k $.
$d N k $.
$d k ph $.
